pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, October 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Yerevan, Armenia

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Plenary Session III.

Plenary Room, Third Floor
Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concerts Complex

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Restricted Plenary Session.

Closed to media.

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Questions and Summary Session.

Closed to media.

1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Closing Session of the XVIIth Francophonie Summit.

Plenary Room, Third Floor
Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concerts Complex

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Conference Room, Ground Floor
Media International Conference Centre
Karen Demirchyan Sports and Concerts Complex

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an official welcoming ceremony.

Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a tête-à-tête meeting with Prime Minister of the Republic of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Tête-à-Tête Room, Third Floor
Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold an expanded meeting with Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

White Hall, Third Floor
Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President of the Republic of Armenia Armen Sarkissian.

Meeting Room, Second Floor
Office of the President

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

8:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner hosted by Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Big Hall, Ground Floor
Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

    • Official photographers only
